headerContent.title: DAVOZ Anastasia
headerContent.subtitle: Apprentice Developer
aboutContent: Fascinated by the digital universe and its infinite possibilities, I decided to embark on this path in 2021.

With a creative nature, my experience as a fashion designer has allowed me to develop adaptability and client needs management, valuable assets in many fields. I am looking for my first work-study or internship experience to progress in this sector.
I am still seeking my specialization, but I am convinced that my passion for technologies, whatever they may be, will help me achieve my goal of becoming a digital expert.

projectsContent.title: Dev-js
projectsContent.tech: Technologies used: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Prisma, Zod, Server Actions, Next Auth, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn-ui, Stripe
projectsContent.description: This collaborative project, conducted with a self-taught partner, involves developing an accessible e-learning platform. The goal is to strengthen our technical skills while providing support to accompany others in their learning journey. We are preparing tutorial videos as well as fun exercises.

projectsContent.title: Memory Game
projectsContent.description: This memory game, developed entirely for my exam, invites users to match pairs of cards. I designed this project from A to Z, managing the game logic, front-end design, and database integration. This experience strengthened my skills in interactive application development and allowed me to apply various modern technologies.
